title: Erik and the Gods: Journey to Valhalla
description: One evening, during a terrible storm, the God of Thunder appears to 13-year-old Erik. He sends Erik on a mission to travel back in time to the Land of the Dead to rescue the Goddess of Eternal Life from the giants. But time is running out. Can Erik rescue the goddess in time and prevent the end of the world?
author: Lars-Henrik Olsen
